sentences.sContent: Their motorboat struck a rock and began to sink.
sentences.sCn: 他们的摩托艇触了礁，开始下沉。

sentences.sContent: The kids watched as the coin sank to the bottom of the pool.
sentences.sCn: 孩子们看着那枚硬币沉到池底。

sentences.sContent: The heavy guns sank up to their barrels in the mud.
sentences.sCn: 这些沉重的大炮深陷在泥里，只露出炮管。

phrases.pCn: 激进现实主义；厨房洗涤池；厨房洗涤盆

words.tran: 沉没的；凹陷的；比周围低的
铅锤；铅坠；[矿业] 凿井工；下沉的人

remMethod.val: 墨水(ink)滴入池(sink)中， 染黑一池水

trans.tranCn: (过去式 sank, 过去分词 sunk; 过去式 sunk, 过去分词 sunken) 下沉；沉下
trans.tranOther: to go down below the surface of water, mud etc
